rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

res.rBody: Exaudisti domine orationem servi tui ut aedificarem templum nomini tuo benedic et sanctifica domum istam in sempiternum deus Israel

vBody.wit: CAO-B CAO-E CAO-V CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody:
Domine qui custodis pactum et misericordiam
servis tuis cum servis tuis qui ambulant coram te
in toto corde suo in toto corde tuo in veritate

Qui regis Israel
intende qui deducis velut ovem Joseph
silent reading

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd
